original_text: A woman lived in that same city. Her husband had died. She came to the judge many times with a problem. “Somebody is doing bad things against me. Please keep me safe from that person,” she was saying.
korean_text: 그 도시에 한 과부가 있어 자주 그에게 가서 내 원수에 대한 나의 원한을 풀어 주소서 하되

sentences.original_text: A woman lived in that same city.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 여자가 그와 같은 도시에 살고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: She came to the judge many times with a problem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 문제를 가지고 여러 번 판사에게 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Somebody is doing bad things against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가가 나에게 나쁜 일을 하고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Please keep me safe from that person.
